article_title: Kim Strassel: The Next Prez and the Obama Way
article_text:
Date: Jan. 21, 2017

To: POTUS

From: Your loyal and determined GOP advisers

Re: Your First 100 Days.

Hey Boss!

Congrats again (and fab party last night). Eight long years, and a Republican is finally back behind the Resolute desk. Pity about the Senate; Harry Reid is already vowing to shut the place down again. We put your chances of getting your agenda through that chamber in the range of slim to snowball.

But we’ve been thinking. Yes, the Constitution matters—Article I, Article II, blah, blah—though let’s be honest: What really counts in this town is precedent. A...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, Potomac Watch columnist Kimberley Strassel asks: Prosecutorial discretion? OK, how about not enforcing the 73,954 pages of tax code?
twitter.title: The Next Prez and the Obama Way

article_metadata.article.origheadline: The Next Prez and the Obama Way

article_summary:
Yes, the Constitution matters—Article I, Article II, blah, blah—though let’s be honest: What really counts in this town is precedent.
Pity about the Senate; Harry Reid is already vowing to shut the place down again.
We put your chances of getting your agenda through that chamber in the range of slim to snowball.
Date: Jan. 21, 2017To: POTUSFrom: Your loyal and determined GOP advisersRe: Your First 100 Days.
But we’ve been thinking.
